Klever app is a simple, powerful, smart, and secure multi-crypto wallet for Bitcoin (BTC), Reef Finance (REEF), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu Coin (SHIB), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance (BNB), and other cryptocurrency assets serving over 2 million users from more than 200 countries worldwide.

With Klever, you can hold, sell, buy and swap your cryptoassets and earn passive income by staking, all of this with no registration or KYC.

Diversity of Coins and Tokens

The Klever ecosystem supports 20 Blockchains & Thousands of Cryptos for secure storing, sending, receiving, charging, and swapping of cryptocurrencies, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Reef Finance (REEF), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu Coin (SHIB), TRON (TRX), Binance (BNB), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), DigiByte (DGB), Dash (DASH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), All ERC20, TRC10, BEP20, TRC20 tokens.

Klever is available in 24 languages and the app has the feature to show all values and prices in over 164 different national currencies, aside from the standard USD.

Hold, Buy, and Sell Crypto

You can buy Bitcoin, Ethereum, Reef, Dogecoin, Shiba Inu Coin, and more crypto with a credit or debit card from anywhere in the world and receive your purchased coins in your wallet in just a few minutes, with full security all inside the Klever App.

Buying Bitcoin, Ethereum, Reef, Dogecoin, Shiba Inu Coin and other cryptocurrencies is not only super simple with Klever Wallet but also safe and enjoyable, made for both newcomers and seasoned crypto enthusiasts.

Swap Feature

Klever Swap offers Bitcoin, Ethereum, Reef, Dogecoin, Shiba Inu Coin, TRON, and 50 other crypto assets, totaling more than 300 instant pairs for direct trade in Klever Swap, which allows you to securely convert any crypto or token to another at the push of a button with low fees and without ever having to leave your wallet. 

Staking Feature

Earn a passive income by staking Bitcoin (BTC), Reef Finance (REEF), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu Coin (SHIB), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance (BNB), and other coins and tokens.

Built-in Browser

Thousands of Ethereum and Tron-based decentralized apps (dapps) are accessible in Klever Browser, all seamlessly integrated inside the app to offer a lifestyle of passive income and lucrative investment opportunities for our users.

Klever Wallet enables you to use the largest selection of dapps on the blockchain, from games, entertainment, lifestyle, investments, decentralized finance, and other p2p applications.

No registration, No KYC

Klever allows you to invest in Bitcoin (BTC), Reef Finance (REEF), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu Coin (SHIB), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance (BNB), and other cryptocurrencies with no need of registration, KYC, or selfie.

You in Control of your Crypto

Klever is a decentralized p2p and self-custody crypto wallet, putting the keys in the hands of our users. This means that you have full control of your private keys and that we cannot at any time or in any way access users’ funds or view your private keys.

This way you fully control your own money and crypto such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Reef, Dogecoin, Shiba Inu Coin, and more.

We offer true and secure ownership of your cryptocurrency and financial investments.

Military Security Level

Klever’s encrypted and secure architecture makes private keys and sensitive data available only on the user’s specific mobile device, as we utilize the latest military-grade technology for encryption.

Investing in crypto and taking part in the world of decentralized finance should be simple and easy, and that is exactly what we are all about!

summary.label:
Mastercard Pay with Rewards is only available on certain Mastercard cards. Please check with your issuer of your card for availability.
 
Pay with Rewards allows you to spend your points like cash at millions of participating locations worldwide. This app allows you to connect a Mastercard card and configure when and where your points will be redeemed. When using your card, your payment is processed as normal. If you choose to redeem points you will receive a statement credit to your card.
 
Getting Started
* Connecting your card to the Pay with Rewards app is simple: enter your Pay with Rewards-enabled Mastercard card number and establish a four digit app PIN. The PIN will be used by the app to protect your personal settings and information.
* Answer the security questions. Your questions are based on information your financial institution has on file. Select any one question from the list. If you have questions or are not able to proceed, please contact the issuer of your card.
* The home screen will show your points balance, the cash equivalent of your points balance, and your current Pay with Rewards setting. Turn Pay with Rewards on for subsequent purchases, or leave it off and choose from recent purchases eligible for redemption under Activity.

title.label: Pay with Rewards - MasterCard
